A Mini Bookdown Tori Culler 1 Introduction 1.1 About this book: This is a test textbook created as part of the Library Juice Academy course “Git & GitHub for Libraries”. This book was created as part of a tutorial to demonstrate GitHub as a publishing platform as well as GitHub Actions.

2 GitHubActions “Automate, customize, and execute your software development workflows right in your repository with GitHub Actions. You can discover, create, and share actions to perform any job you’d like, including CI/CD, and combine actions in a completely customized workflow.” From GitHub Actions documentation
